com.shephertz.app42.paas.sdk.android.upload

Class UploadService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shephertz.app42.paas.sdk.android.App42Service
      • com.shephertz.app42.paas.sdk.android.upload.UploadService

  • public class UploadService
extends App42Service
    Uploads file on the cloud. Allows access to the files through url. Its especially useful for mobile/device apps. It minimizes the App footprint on the device.
    See Also:
    Upload, App42Response

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.shephertz.app42.paas.sdk.android.App42Service

    • Method Detail

      • uploadFile

        public Upload uploadFile(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String filePath,
                UploadFileType fileType,
                java.lang.String description)
                  throws App42Exception
        Uploads file on the cloud.
        Parameters:
        name - - The name of the file which has to be saved. It is used to retrieve the file.
        filePath - - The local path for the file
        fileType - - The type of the file. File can be either Audio, Video, Image, Binary, Txt, xml, json, csv or other Use the static constants e.g. Upload.AUDIO, Upload.XML etc.
        description - - Description of the file to be uploaded.
        Returns:
        Upload object
        Throws:
        App42Exception

      • uploadFileForGroup

        public Upload uploadFileForGroup(java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.String userName,
                        java.lang.String ownerName,
                        java.lang.String groupName,
                        java.lang.String filePath,
                        UploadFileType fileType,
                        java.lang.String description)
                          throws App42Exception
        Parameters:
        name - - The name of the file which has to be saved. It is used to retrieve the file.
        userName - - Name of the user who is uploading the file
        ownerName - - Name of owner of the group
        groupName - - Name of the group in which file has to upload
        filePath - - The local path for the file
        fileType - - Type of the file e.g. Upload.AUDIO, Upload.XML etc.
        description - - Description of the file to be uploaded.
        Returns:
        Upload object
        Throws:
        App42Exception
